LanguageData.VFEA_Recruiting_Forbidden.label: forbidden
LanguageData.VFEA_Recruiting_Forbidden.description: We do not need anyone’s help, and will not accept any outsiders into our ranks.
LanguageData.VFEA_BeingRecruited_Forbidden.label: forbidden
LanguageData.VFEA_BeingRecruited_Forbidden.descriptio: We are a proud nation and will not join anyone, as it brings us great shame.
